metadata.description: wave goodbye to all your worries, sink back in your chair and chill with opiate. this one is designed to make you groove deep down - the sexiest melodies this side of the moon could not be represented by anyone better than venus, the goddess of love and illicit delights. say no more.
metadata.title: Opiate - Venus (Illicit Delights) [mia023]
metadata.subject: Down beat / Chill
